summary: This bill, S. 1532, amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the railroad track maintenance credit. It increases the credit amount from $3,500 to $6,100, with provisions for inflation adjustments starting in 2025. It also updates the date used in determining qualified railroad track maintenance expenditures. The amendments apply to expenditures paid or incurred in taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
